attributes.action: Instruct NICE to decide if it is appropriate to fund Homeopathy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many new medicines are unavailable because their cost to performance ratio, as judged by NICE,  does not equate with NHS norms. Many people feel that homeopathy has not been evaluated with anything approaching the the same rigor.
This petition is to request that NICE urgently investigates why scarce NHS resources are being commited to this seemingly unproven form of treatment.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to instruct NICE to decide if it is appropriate to fund Homeopathy.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 


http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=NHSHomeopathy


Her Majesty's Government
